name: Portgas.D.Ace
text: On Play: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

effect.text: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.
